member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.CameraApplicationManager
member.summary: Enables an app to launch a dialog that displays all of the lens apps installed on the device and allows the user to quickly switch between them.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.CameraApplicationManager.ShowInstalledApplicationsUI
member.summary: Launches a dialog that displays all of the lens apps installed on the device and allows the user to quickly switch between them.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.Capture.ScreenCapture
member.summary: Enables an app to capture audio and video of the contents being displayed on the device.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.ScreenCapture.AudioSource
member.summary: Gets the audio source used for screen capture.
member.returns: The audio source used for screen capture.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.ScreenCapture.IsAudioSuspended
member.summary: Gets whether the screen capture of audio is currently suspended.
member.returns: Whether the screen capture audio is currently suspended.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.ScreenCapture.IsVideoSuspended
member.summary: Gets whether the screen capture of video is currently suspended.
member.returns: Whether the screen capture of video is currently suspended.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.ScreenCapture.VideoSource
member.summary: Gets the video source used for screen capture.
member.returns: The video source used for screen capture.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.Capture.ScreenCapture.SourceSuspensionChanged
member.summary: Raised when the suspension of screen captured audio or video changes.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Capture.ScreenCapture.GetForCurrentView
member.summary: Gets the ScreenCapture object associated with the app's current view.
member.returns: The ScreenCapture object associated with the app's current view.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.Capture.SourceSuspensionChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information about a SourceSuspensionChanged event which is triggered when the capture of audio or video is suspended or resumed.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.SourceSuspensionChangedEventArgs.IsAudioSuspended
member.summary: Gets whether the screen capture of audio is currently suspended.
member.returns: Whether the screen capture of audio is currently suspended.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.SourceSuspensionChangedEventArgs.IsVideoSuspended
member.summary: Gets whether the screen capture of audio is currently suspended.
member.returns: Whether the screen capture of audio is currently suspended.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.Effects.SlowMotionEffectDefinition
member.summary: Represents a slow motion effect definition.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Effects.SlowMotionEffectDefinition.#ctor
member.summary: Creates and initializes a new instance of the SlowMotionEffectDefinition object.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Effects.SlowMotionEffectDefinition.ActivatableClassId
member.summary: Gets the activatable class ID of the slow motion effect definition.
member.returns: The identifier of the runtime class in the operating system, such as "Windows.Media.Effects.SlowMotionEffectDefinition".

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Effects.SlowMotionEffectDefinition.Properties
member.summary: Gets the set of properties for configuring the SlowMotionEffectDefinition object.
member.returns: The set of properties for configuring the SlowMotionEffectDefinition object.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Effects.SlowMotionEffectDefinition.TimeStretchRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the current time stretch rate.
member.returns: The current time stretch rate.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.SpeechRecognition.VoiceCommandManager
member.summary: A static class that enables installing command sets from a Voice Command Definition (VCD) file, and getting installed command sets.
member.deprecated: VoiceCommandManager may be altered or unavailable for releases after Windows Phone 8.1. Instead, use Windows.ApplicationModel.VoiceCommands.VoiceCommandDefinitionManager.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.SpeechRecognition.VoiceCommandManager.InstalledCommandSets
member.summary: A dictionary that contains all installed command sets that have a Name attribute set in the Voice Command Definition (VCD) file.
member.returns: The dictionary of installed command sets that have a Name attribute set in the Voice Command Definition (VCD) file.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.SpeechRecognition.VoiceCommandManager.InstallCommandSetsFromStorageFileAsync(Windows.Storage.StorageFile)
member.summary: Installs the CommandSet elements in a Voice Command Definition (VCD) file.
member.deprecated: Use Windows.ApplicationModel.VoiceCommands.VoiceCommandDefinitionManager instead of Windows.Media.SpeechRecognition.VoiceComandManager. For more info, see MSDN.
member.returns: An asynchronous action.
member.param: An object representing a Voice Command Definition (VCD) file.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.SpeechRecognition.VoiceCommandSet
member.summary: Enables operations on a specific installed command set.
member.deprecated: VoiceCommandSet may be altered or unavailable for releases after Windows Phone 8.1. Instead, use Windows.ApplicationModel.VoiceCommands.VoiceCommandDefinition.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.SpeechRecognition.VoiceCommandSet.Language
member.summary: Gets the language (xml:lang) value of the CommandSet element in the Voice Command Definition (VCD) file.
member.returns: The language (xml:lang) of the command set.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.SpeechRecognition.VoiceCommandSet.Name
member.summary: Gets the Name attribute value of the CommandSet element in the Voice Command Definition (VCD) file.
member.returns: The Name attribute value of the CommandSet element.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBar
member.summary: Provides methods and properties for interacting with the status bar on a window (app view).

member.name: P:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBar.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the status bar. The alpha channel of the color is not used.
member.returns: The background color of the status bar.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBar.BackgroundOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the opacity of the background color of the status bar.
member.returns: The opacity of the background color of the status bar.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBar.ForegroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground color of the status bar. The alpha channel of the color is not used.
member.returns: The foreground color of the status bar.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBar.OccludedRect
member.summary: Gets the region of the core window currently occluded by the status bar.
member.returns: The region of the core window currently occluded by the status bar.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBar.ProgressIndicator
member.summary: Gets the progress indicator for the status bar.
member.returns: The progress indicator for the status bar.

member.name: E:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBar.Hiding
member.summary: This event is raised when the status bar is being hidden.

member.name: E:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBar.Showing
member.summary: This event is raised when the status bar is being shown.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBar.GetForCurrentView
member.summary: Gets the status bar for the current window (app view).
member.returns: The status bar for the current window (app view).

member.name: M:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBar.HideAsync
member.summary: Hides the status bar.
member.returns: The asynchronous results of the operation. Use this to determine when the async call is complete.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBar.ShowAsync
member.summary: Shows the status bar.
member.returns: The asynchronous results of the operation. Use this to determine when the async call is complete.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBarProgressIndicator
member.summary: Provides methods and properties for interacting with the progress indicator on the status bar on a window (app view).

member.name: P:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBarProgressIndicator.ProgressValue
member.summary: Gets or sets a value representing progress in the range 0 to 1.
member.returns: A value representing progress in the range 0 to 1.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBarProgressIndicator.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text label displayed on the progress indicator.
member.returns: The text label displayed on the progress indicator.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBarProgressIndicator.HideAsync
member.summary: Hides the progress indicator.
member.returns: The asynchronous results of the operation. Use this to determine when the async call is complete.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.StatusBarProgressIndicator.ShowAsync
member.summary: Shows the progress indicator.
member.returns: The asynchronous results of the operation. Use this to determine when the async call is complete.
